p: The median CFU concentration at day 5 and later (Time >2 days) of the different type of oil suspensions and the no‐carbon suspensions was lower than the median total cell concentrations at day 5 and later (Supporting Information Table S1). The median of the CFU concentrations measured during incubation at days 2, 5, 7, 8, and 12 of the different suspensions was significantly different compared to the median of the corresponding total cell concentrations ( p < 0.05).
